providerInfoForm.description: Please provide the provider details below.
providerInfoForm.successMessage: Provider information has been successfully submitted.

alert.title: For Professionals!
alert.description: If you are a professional please fill this information otherwise reselect the service type.

tin_number.label: TIN Number/ TAX ID
tin_number.description: Tax Identification Number of the provider.
tin_number.error: TIN number/ TAX ID is required.

institute_name.label: Institute Name
institute_name.description: The name of the provider's institute.

provider_last_name.label: Last Name
provider_last_name.error: Last name is required. Only letters are allowed.

provider_first_name.label: First Name
provider_first_name.error: First name is required. Only letters are allowed.

provider_middle_initial.label: Middle Initial
provider_middle_initial.error: Middle initial must atleast 1 character. Only letters are allowed.

provider_title.label: Provider Title
provider_title.description: Title of the provider (e.g., Dr., Mr., Mrs.).
provider_title.error: Provider title is required. Select the professional title that best describes you

provider_contact_person.label: Contact Person
provider_contact_person.description: Name of the contact person for the provider.

provider_contact_email.label: Contact Email
provider_contact_email.description: Email address of the contact person.
provider_contact_email.error: A valid email address is required.

provider_contact_phone_number.label: Contact Phone Number
provider_contact_phone_number.description: Phone number of the contact person.
provider_contact_phone_number.error: A valid phone number is required between 10 and 15 digits.

provider_discount_agreement.label: Discount Agreement
provider_discount_agreement.description: Percentage discount agreed upon with the provider.
provider_discount_agreement.error: Discount agreement must be a valid percentage.

provider_health_tier.label: Provider Health Tier
provider_health_tier.description: Choose the provider health tier that best describes your service level.

provider_health_sub_tier.label: Provider Health Sub-Tier

provider_health_sub_tier.description: Select the sub-tier based on the chosen health tier.

provider_service_type.label: Service Type
provider_service_type.description: Type of service provided (e.g., individual / Professional, inistitue).

provider_date_of_birth.description: Enter your birth date in the format MM-DD-YYYY.
provider_date_of_birth.error: Please enter your date of birth in the format MM-DD-YYYY.

provider_city.label: City
provider_city.description: City where the provider is located.

provider_zip_code.label: ZIP Code / Woreda
provider_zip_code.description: ZIP code or Woreda name for the provider's address.
provider_zip_code.error: ZIP code or Woreda name must be valid.

provider_phone_number.label: Phone Number
provider_phone_number.description: Primary phone number of the provider.
provider_phone_number.error: A valid phone number is required between 10 and 15 digits.

provider_fax.label: Fax
provider_fax.description: Fax number of the provider, if available.

provider_email.label: Email
provider_email.error: A valid email address is required.

provider_type.label: Provider Type
provider_type.description: Type of provider (e.g., healthcare, service provider).

provider_primary_specialty.label: Primary Specialty
provider_primary_specialty.description: The primary specialty of the provider.

medicare_provider_number.label: Medicare Provider Number
medicare_provider_number.description: The Medicare provider number assigned to the provider.

provider_group_name.label: Group Name
provider_group_name.description: The name of the provider group.

provider_group_contact_person.description: The contact person for the provider group.

provider_group_phone_number.description: The phone number of the provider group.
provider_group_phone_number.error: A valid phone number is required between 10 and 15 digits.

provider_group_address.label: Group Address
provider_group_address.description: The address of the provider group.

Questionnaire.helpUsUnderstand: Help us understand your health history and lifestyle to provide you with the best care.
Questionnaire.familyHistoryQuestion: Does your family have a history of the following conditions? (Check all that apply)
Questionnaire.currentConditionsQuestion: Are you currently being treated for any of the following conditions? (Check all that apply)
Questionnaire.takingMedications: Are you currently taking any medications?
Questionnaire.anyAllergies: Do you have any allergies to medications, foods, or other substances?
Questionnaire.preventiveScreeningsQuestion: Have you undergone the following screenings in the past year? (Check all that apply)
Questionnaire.pregnantOrPlanning: Are you currently pregnant or planning to become pregnant?
Questionnaire.hadMammogramLastYear: Have you had a mammogram or pap smear in the last year?
